channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside lemoge clinic, 4th October
item.description:
Reported back in June. Still not been fixed. It is extremely noisy as a vast amount of traffic go over it day and night.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins still not collected, 4th October
item.description:
Rubbish overflowing becoming a health hazard on Clapton terrace

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Street bin, 4th October
item.description:
Bin is full of domestic waste dog poo and food overflowing on to the street by residential houses and public transport bus stop

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garland Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Mattress, 4th October
item.description:
There is also a dumped mattress at the corner on the tree at Grange Walk and Neckinger the furniture that I have attached on this report is also at the corner of Grange Walk and Neckinger

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Grange Walk, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Blue wheelie bin, 4th October

A blue wheelie bin has been put here and people have been putting rubbish here.

item.title: Fly tipped mattress blocking pavement, 4th October
item.description:
There is a mattress blocking the pavement outside approx 2 Roydene Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roydene Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: A large shelter has been built, 4th October
item.description:
There is someone living in a large shelter in the middle of the wooded section of the park. The shelter is well hidden from the paths, and you need to go into the middle and out of sight of the paths. I stumbled upon it, and the person that lives here is homeless. There is also a lot of rubbish here, like old mattresses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martens Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of rubbish dumped in path, 4th October
item.description:
Bags, cardboard and loose rubbish strewn all over path in front of business. Taking up walking space, not accessible for wheelchairs or buggies, attracting rodents

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, Great Titchfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light broken and hanging by a wire, 4th October
item.description:
The light on the lamp post is broken off and hanging by a single wire. It is swinging a great deal in the wind. It is in danger of flying off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lincoln Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road flooded, 4th October
item.description:
The road is flooded across Ongar Road and making cars go into the other lane.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged lampost still here, 4th October
item.description:
Hi, I reported a month ago about this, you said to get in touch if it’s not been removed in 4 weeks time, it hasn’t. Please could you speed up the removal of the damaged/leaning lampost, it’s in my way when entering and exiting my driveway, we’ve already cleaned up all the oil and debris left from the accident as the council wouldn’t. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baldwyn's Park, Coldblow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bagged to waste outside number 22 Blenheim Terrace, 4th October
item.description:
There are two bags of garbage left illegally by the tree outside number 22 Blenheim Terrace can you please collect and also investigate? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blenheim Terrace, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping under shrubs, 4th October
item.description:
Fly tipping is accumulating under the shrubs in front of the windows, and no cleaning nor maintenance has been done in the past several months. There is a toaster just visible under the branches, as well as clothing, cans and bottles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Villas Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car dumbed for over 1 year, 4th October
item.description:
